pancakes.title: with Butter
pancakes.description: Good old fashioned Pancakes with butter by my Grandma's recipe book. Ingredients includes: flour, salt, sugar, milk, eggs, baking powder, butter. Portion of 200 grams, it has 158 calories; protein 4.5g; carbohydrates 21.7g; fat 5.9g.

pancakes.title: with Maple Syrup
pancakes.description: Good old fashioned Pancakes with maple syrup by my Grandma's recipe book. Ingredients includes: flour, salt, sugar, milk, eggs, baking powder, maple syrup. Portion of 210 grams, 178 calories; protein 5g; carbohydrates 23g; fat 6g.

pancakes.title: with Banana
pancakes.description: Good old fashioned Pancakes with banana by my Grandma's recipe book. Ingredients includes: flour, salt, sugar, milk, eggs, baking powder, banana. Portion of 220 grams, 188 calories; protein 5g; carbohydrates 25g; fat 5g.

pancakes.title: with Strawberry
pancakes.description: Good old fashioned Pancakes with strawberry by my Grandma's recipe book. Ingredients includes: flour, salt, sugar, milk, eggs, baking powder, strawberry, cream. Portion of 240 grams, 198 calories; protein 5g; carbohydrates 28g; fat 6g.
